description:
Key Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with operations to define material and service needs
  • Negotiate and manage purchase orders to meet site demands
  • Maintain supplier performance in terms of On-Time Delivery (OTD), Fill Rate, and Quality
  • Ensure adherence to internal procurement performance expectations
  • Identify and execute continuous improvement opportunities
  • Provide information and analysis for make/buy decisions
  • Develop and manage purchasing cost savings opportunities
  • Negotiate supplier agreements
  • Assist Global Sourcing leadership with defined projects and strategic sourcing initiatives
  • Support Site Planning to maintain current and accurate raw material inventory levels
  • Ensure accuracy of supplier lead times in demand systems
  • Align payment terms
  • Maintain an understanding of key supplier business and financial risks

Position Overview

Join our Global Sourcing & Procurement Team in Palm Beach Gardens, FL as a key Buyer responsible for cost management and executing strategic sourcing initiatives at the site level. This role requires a strong background in purchasing within a manufacturing environment.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in business, supply chain, or a related field
  • 3 years of experience in purchasing within a manufacturing setting
  • Proficiency in Excel and ability to work in a complex matrix environment
  • Position located in Palm Beach Gardens, FL; local candidates preferred

Additional Details

The company maintains a drug-free workplace and conducts post-conditional offer/pre-employment drug and alcohol testing, as well as various background checks. Candidates may be required to undergo additional job-related medical tests, background checks, or other assessments based on the specific position applied for.

Employment Type: Contractor
